title: Mastering Type: The Essential Guide to Typography for Print and
description:
Mastering Type: The Essential Guide to Typography for Print and Web Design

Denise Bosler

English | 2012 | 240 Webpages | ISBN: 1440313695 | EPUB | 21 MB

Typography is almost everywhere. From a drive down the highway or browsing in a grocery retailer to browsing the world wide web and navigating our PDAs, we are bombarded by phrases in a plethora of designs, measurements, and preparations. It is vital for designers to realize the fundamentals of typography to optimise this communication. This e-book provides a strong history in typographic knowledge for the two print and electronic press.
